stepIntro.subject: Answer
stepIntro.description: Please provide a title and short description for your answer

stepIntro.subject: Group Responses
stepIntro.description: Of these issues, please group similar responses to facilitate your decision-making by avoiding duplicates. If no duplicates are found, you may continue to the next section below.

stepIntro.subject: Rank Responses
stepIntro.description: Please rate the following responses as Most, Neutral, or Least important. You must rate two responses as Most Important, and one as Least Important.

stepIntro.subject: Why it's Most Important
stepIntro.description: Of the issues you thought were Most important, please give a brief explanation of why it's important for everyone to consider it.

steps.intro: Of the issues you thought were Most important, please give a brief explanation of why it's important for everyone to consider it

stepIntro.subject: Why it's Least Important
stepIntro.description: Of the issues you thought were least important, please give a brief explanation of why it's important for everyone to consider it.

steps.intro: Of the issues you thought were Least important, please give a brief explanation of why it's important for everyone to consider it

stepIntro.subject: Compare Reasons Why It's Most Important
stepIntro.description: Compare two responses and select a response that is most important for the community to consider.

stepIntro.subject: Compare Reasons Why It's Least Important
stepIntro.description: Compare two responses and select a response that is most important for the community to consider.

stepIntro.subject: Review
stepIntro.description: These are the issues you sorted earlier, with reasons added by the discussion. Please consider the reasons and sort the list again.

stepIntro.subject: Intermission
stepIntro.description: When more people have gotten to this point we will invite you back to continue the deliberation.
